name: imagemagick-webui
description: Modern web GUI for ImageMagick with AI-powered background removal, batch processing, and real-time preview. Built with Next.js, FastAPI, and Docker.
readme_summary: ImageMagick WebGUI is a modern, user-friendly web interface for ImageMagick, offering a wide range of image manipulation tools and AI-powered features like background removal and auto-enhancement. It provides a real-time preview and supports batch processing, making it suitable for both casual users and power users via a terminal mode.
primary_use_case: Providing an accessible and feature-rich web-based interface for performing various image editing and processing tasks, enhanced with AI capabilities.
cover_image_prompt: A whimsical, magical workshop where a friendly artisan is using a glowing, multi-faceted crystal (representing ImageMagick) to transform ordinary photographs. On one side, raw images are fed into the crystal, appearing as simple, flat pictures. As they pass through, they emerge from the other side with vibrant colors, sharp details, and even with their backgrounds seamlessly removed, appearing as polished artworks. Subtle UI elements like sliders and buttons are integrated into the workshop's machinery. The overall mood is creative and efficient, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with soft, inviting lighting.

name: mssh
description: Enable SSH access to machines behind NAT without a VPN
readme_summary: mssh is a Go-based tool that enables SSH access to machines located behind NAT or firewalls. It uses a minimal rendezvous server to facilitate connections, eliminating the need for complex VPN setups and working seamlessly with the standard `ssh` command.
key_features: SSH access to machines behind NAT/firewalls
Configurable node IDs and server addresses
Systemd service integration for server and agent
primary_use_case: To provide secure and straightforward SSH access to remote machines that are not directly exposed to the internet due to NAT or firewall restrictions.
cover_image_prompt: A visual metaphor of a lighthouse keeper on a remote island, using a powerful spotlight (the mssh server) to send a clear beam of light across a stormy sea to a small, isolated boat (the NATed machine). The boat's captain can then use this beam to navigate safely to a larger mainland port (the client's connection). Subtle digital particles representing data flow emanate from the lighthouse beam towards the boat. The scene is set at dusk with dramatic lighting, emphasizing the connection being established across a difficult environment. The overall style is a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, modern aesthetic, highlighting the mssh name subtly etched on the lighthouse base.

name: pointless
description: An endless drawing canvas desktop app made with Tauri (Rust) and React üé® ‚úçÔ∏è
readme_summary: Pointless is a cross-platform desktop application for drawing and note-taking, built with Tauri and React. It offers an infinite canvas with features like shape creation, undo/redo, and local file persistence, saving data with brotli-unicode compression for small file sizes.
key_features: Brotli-unicode compression for small file sizes
Selection, Move, Color change, Copy/paste shapes
primary_use_case: A simple, distraction-free digital whiteboard or note-taking application with an infinite canvas for creative or organizational tasks.
cover_image_prompt: A whimsical, infinite scroll unfurling endlessly across a digital landscape. On the scroll, a friendly, stylized artist character is drawing various shapes (arrows, circles, squares) with a glowing digital pen. Small, subtle UI elements like zoom buttons and a color palette float around the artist. The background is a clean, minimalist digital space with soft, ambient lighting. The overall mood is creative and expansive, emphasizing the 'endless' nature of the canvas. The 'Pointless' app logo is subtly integrated into the scene. Rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a vibrant yet clean color palette.

name: ArchiveBox
description: üóÉ Open source self-hosted web archiving. Takes URLs/browser history/bookmarks/Pocket/Pinboard/etc., saves HTML, JS, PDFs, media, and more...
readme_summary: ArchiveBox is an open-source, self-hosted web archiving solution that captures and preserves digital content from various sources. It saves web pages, media, and other online data in durable, readable formats, making it accessible for long-term storage and future use.
key_features: Supports multiple input sources (URLs, bookmarks, Pocket, Pinboard, browser history)
Saves content in various formats (HTML, JS, PDFs, media, WARC, SQLite, JSON)
Provides CLI, REST API, and webhooks for integrations
Includes a browser extension for easy capturing
Offers a self-hosted web interface for browsing archives
Exports archives in static, filesystem-readable formats
primary_use_case: To provide individuals and organizations with a self-hosted, robust solution for preserving digital content from the web in a reliable and accessible manner.
cover_image_prompt: A wise old librarian meticulously organizing and preserving ancient scrolls within a vast, futuristic digital library. Each scroll represents a saved webpage, with digital particles flowing from the internet (represented by glowing data streams) into the librarian's hands, who then carefully places them into labeled, climate-controlled digital archives. Small screens around the scene display the ArchiveBox logo and snippets of saved content like PDFs and images. The overall mood is one of diligent preservation and digital longevity. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, organized aesthetic and a color palette emphasizing blues, greens, and subtle metallic accents.

name: buzz
description: Buzz transcribes and translates audio offline on your personal computer. Powered by OpenAI's Whisper.
readme_summary: Buzz is a desktop application that transcribes and translates audio and video files offline on your personal computer. It leverages OpenAI's Whisper model and offers various features for enhanced transcription accuracy and user experience.
key_features: Offline audio and video transcription and translation
Live microphone transcription with presentation window
Multiple Whisper backend support (CUDA, Apple Silicon, Vulkan)
Export transcripts to TXT, SRT, VTT
Advanced transcription viewer with search and playback controls
primary_use_case: Offline audio and video transcription and translation on a personal computer.
cover_image_prompt: A wise, old owl wearing headphones, perched on a stack of audio and video tapes. The owl is diligently transcribing spoken words from a floating, ethereal soundwave into a glowing digital book. Beside the owl, a small, stylized globe shows different languages being translated. Subtle digital particles representing data flow around the owl. The repository name 'Buzz' is subtly etched into the owl's perch. The scene is set in a cozy, dimly lit study with a soft glow emanating from the digital book. The style is a 3D isometric illustration with a warm, inviting color palette, emphasizing clarity and offline processing.

name: discord-id-bypass-tool
description: A verified tool that works on any potato computer that will let you bypass discord verification
readme_summary: This repository provides a browser-based tool to control a 3D avatar's head and mouth movements in real-time using a gamepad or keyboard. It aims to bypass Discord's verification process by simulating live human input with a rigged avatar.
key_features: Real-time 3D avatar head and mouth control
primary_use_case: Bypassing Discord verification by simulating live avatar input.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, slightly mischievous-looking 3D avatar wearing a headset, with its mouth animated to speak. The avatar is positioned in front of a glowing, stylized representation of a Discord verification screen. From the avatar's mouth, streams of digital data flow towards the verification screen, subtly bypassing a lock icon. In the background, a gamepad and keyboard are subtly integrated into the scene, hinting at the input methods. The overall mood is playful and technologically advanced, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The 'Discord ID Bypass Tool' text is subtly integrated into a digital interface element. Style: 3D isometric illustration with vibrant, glowing elements and a dark background.
